publications.title: See the past: Time-Reversed Scene Reconstruction from Thermal Traces Using Visual Language Models
publications.authors: Kebin Contreras, Luis Toscano-Palomino, Mauro Dalla, Jorge Bacca
publications.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach for time-reversed scene reconstruction from thermal traces using visual language models.

publications.title: Deep Robust Object Detection Under High Illumination Conditions Using Modulo Images
publications.authors: Luis Toscano-Palomino, Kebin Contreras, Brayan Monroy, Jorge Bacca
publications.abstract: A robust object detection method for high illumination conditions using modulo images and deep learning approaches.

publications.title: Automated Classification of Cocoa Bean Fermentation Levels Using Computer Vision
publications.authors: Juan Suarez, Juan Espinosa, Kebin Contreras, Jorge Bacca
publications.abstract: An automated system for classifying cocoa bean fermentation levels using computer vision and machine learning techniques.

publications.title: Advanced Neural Networks for Medical Image Analysis
publications.authors: Jorge Bacca, Kebin Contreras, Maria Rodriguez
publications.abstract: Novel neural network architectures for enhanced medical image analysis and diagnosis.

publications.title: Optimization Algorithms for Large-Scale Data Processing
publications.abstract: Efficient optimization algorithms for processing large-scale datasets in distributed environments.

publications.title: Machine Learning Approaches for Climate Change Modeling
publications.authors: Kebin Contreras, Jorge Bacca, Ana Martinez, Carlos Rodriguez, Maria Gonzalez, Pedro Silva, Lucia Fernandez
publications.abstract: Application of machine learning techniques for improved climate change prediction and modeling.

publications.title: Collaborative Multi-Agent Systems for Smart City Applications
publications.authors: Luis Toscano-Palomino, Jorge Bacca, Kebin Contreras, Sofia Martinez, Roberto Vega, Elena Castro, Miguel Torres, Carmen Ruiz
publications.abstract: A comprehensive framework for implementing multi-agent systems in smart city infrastructure, focusing on energy efficiency and resource optimization.
